thread.title: Ground News - Why ‘Bidenomics’ is falling flat with voters
thread.title_full: Ground News - Why ‘Bidenomics’ is falling flat with voters

author: The Hill
title: Ground News - Why ‘Bidenomics’ is falling flat with voters
text:
Summary by The Hill President Biden’s attempt to sell Americans on his role in post-pandemic economic recovery has fallen flat, even as the U.S. economy defies the odds and expectations of experts. Despite widespread fears at the beginning of the year that a recession was on the way, the U.S. economy is on track to finish 2023 with low unemployment, steady economic growth and significantly slower inflation. These remarkable topline numbers, however, have done littl… Share menu More
